attributes.action: stop medical examintaions for all dissabled benefits
attributes.additional_details:
in my husbands medical examination all the doctor did was needlessly pull my husbands leg joints out of socket to confirm his own curiosities about my husbands very rare illness. as you can imagine this was very painfull and left my husband very ill for weeks.
all the doctor talked about was physio thrapy..my husbad WAS ASKED NOTHING ABOUT WORKING.
these medical examitations are painfull,
embarrassing and stressfull to people who are trully dissabled and the fakers know how to fake responses.
they are also a waste of the tax payers money and doctors time, they are pointless.
dissabled people already have assesments by their own doctors and speccialists.

please sign to stop compulsory medical examinations for people on benefits.
